GET /api.description: Serves up a JSON of all the available endpoints of the api

POST /api/users.description: Posts a user following sign up and responds with the posted user excluding the password

GET /api/users.description: Responds with a list of all users

GET /api/users/grumpycat.description: Responds with the relevant user object

POST /api/users/login.description: Attempts to log a user in by username or email, responds with the user information upon success or and obscured error message on failure.
